name: The Galactic Enterprise
description:
Today is your final mission aboard the Galactic Enterprise, but something is not right...

This was made for GDKO Round 6. The challenge was to make a game played with a single button and with the theme Audio. It is recommended to play with sound (use headphones for the best experience). If you are hard of hearing, there are visual cues so you can still complete the game.

  • Controls: Spacebar to jump, You may need to click the game window if the keyboard is not working at the start, or in rare cases reload the page.
  • Sound Effects: All the sound effects are royalty-free from Pixabay or mixkit.co. I edited the sounds with Audacity to create the final versions for each scene. The robot voices are recorded using text-to-speech and edited by me.
  • Music: This game contains three creative commons (CC BY 4.0) songs by Ross Bugden: "Run", "Creepy Horror Music" and "Without Limits". It also contains the song "Simple Piano Melody" by ZakharValaha from Pixabay.
  • Browser: I recommend using Chrome (or Brave). You can also use Firefox but I noticed that sometimes the audio becomes a bit desynchronized.

To learn more about the characters, you can play my GDKO Round 5 and Round 3 entry.
